ValidationRule.description: The rule Ensures all required fields are completed when the Quote status is set to "Indication."
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Indication') && (ISBLANK(Name) || ISBLANK(Marketer_UW_Name__c) || ISBLANK(TEXT(Form_Type__c)) || ISBLANK(TEXT(Premium__c)) || ISBLANK(Notes__c) || ISBLANK(Insurance_Company__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To proceed with Stage Indication, please complete the following required fields: Quote Name, Marketer/UW Name, Carrier Issuing Company, Form Type, Premium, Notes, Insurance Company.
